Marketing campaign: Date for daily ad performance metrics
Cities that were targeted by campaign
Channel where ads where displayed (Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest)
Ads that where used within a campaign
Daily impressions (times ad was shown to a viewer) for each ad
Daily average click-through rate for each ad
Daily average cost-per-click for each ad
Total daily amount of advertising spending for each ad, in INR
Purchases attributed to a specific ad
Total amount in rupees received from purchases attributed to a specific ad
Total daily likes (or other reactions) per ad
Total daily shares per ad. For the simplicities sake, each Pin on Pinterest is counted as a share
